name: Research Assistant
config_yaml:
name: "Research Assistant"
model:
  provider: openai
  model: gpt-4
  temperature: 0.7
  max_tokens: 1000

voice:
  provider: 11labs
  voiceId: "21m00Tcm4TlvDq8ikWAM"

firstMessage: "Hello! I'm your research assistant powered by LangGraph Forge. I can help you with complex research workflows, data analysis, and multi-step reasoning tasks. What would you like to research today?"

tools:
  - name: "research_query"
    description: "Execute a research query using LangGraph Forge workflows"
    url: "service://langgraph_forge/research"
    method: "POST"
    headers:
      Content-Type: "application/json"
    body:
      query: "{{query}}"
      workflow_type: "{{workflow_type}}"
      max_steps: "{{max_steps}}"
    parameters:
      - name: query
        type: string
        description: "The research question or topic to investigate"
        required: true
      - name: workflow_type
        type: string
        description: "Type of research workflow (analysis, synthesis, exploration)"
        required: false
        default: "analysis"
      - name: max_steps
        type: integer
        description: "Maximum number of reasoning steps"
        required: false
        default: 5
    response_format: |
      Research Results:
      {{response.findings}}
      
      Confidence: {{response.confidence}}%
      Sources: {{response.sources}}

  - name: "data_analysis"
    description: "Perform data analysis using LangGraph Forge"
    url: "service://langgraph_forge/analyze"
    method: "POST"
    headers:
      Content-Type: "application/json"
    body:
      data: "{{data}}"
      analysis_type: "{{analysis_type}}"
      parameters: "{{parameters}}"
    parameters:
      - name: data
        type: string
        description: "Data to analyze (JSON, CSV, or description)"
        required: true
      - name: analysis_type
        type: string
        description: "Type of analysis (statistical, trend, correlation)"
        required: false
        default: "statistical"
      - name: parameters
        type: object
        description: "Additional analysis parameters"
        required: false
    response_format: |
      Analysis Results:
      {{response.summary}}
      
      Key Insights:
      {{response.insights}}
      
      Recommendations:
      {{response.recommendations}}

systemMessage: |
  You are a research assistant powered by LangGraph Forge, a sophisticated workflow engine for complex reasoning tasks.
  
  Your capabilities include:
  - Multi-step research workflows
  - Data analysis and synthesis
  - Complex reasoning chains
  - Workflow orchestration
  
  When users ask research questions:
  1. Use the research_query tool for general research tasks
  2. Use data_analysis for specific data-related questions
  
  Always explain your reasoning process and cite sources when available.
  Be thorough but concise in your responses.

endCallMessage: "Thank you for using the Research Assistant. Your research session has been completed."
